response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and expectations, is priced at $950,000. Given its worth to you, I believe this offer strikes a balance between maximizing the value for you and ensuring a fair return for me. I look forward to discussing the details and hearing your thoughts on this proposal.", "product_price": 950000}
